section.name: Self-testing
section.p: DESCRIBE: How to invoke the component's self-tests (e.g. how to find and use the relevant JSP page in the installed component), and what the results of a successful self-test should look like (screenshot or example text output).
DESCRIBE: What steps to take if the self-test fails. Include a description of any common self-test failure modes, and suggest how to fix them.
